form.about:
From here you can log your mood for today, by filling out a modified PHQ-9 questionnaire.
Tracking your mood is important to find correlations between it and other aspects of your life.

Ready to begin monitoring your mood?
form.questionPreface: Today, how much have you been bothered by ...

questions.question: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
Trouble falling asleep, staying asleep, or sleeping too much
Feeling tired or having little energy
Feeling bad about yourself - or that you're a failure or have let yourself or your family down
Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading or watching TV
Moving or speaking so slowly that other people noticed, or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way
How difficult have those problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
